JobFullDesc: Job DescriptionOverviewAt LogMeIn we are looking for motivated/passionate Business Development Representatives who will be focused on outbound calling activities, executing on marketing campaigns and leads, inbound calls & chats, and qualifying and developing inbound interest that all result in better-qualified opportunities, new sales pipeline, increased conversions and revenue.The Business Development role at LogMeIn is an important component to the success of our sales teams and our business. It is also a great opportunity for people new or early in their technology careers to learn Sales and gain business experience at world class SaaS company.ResponsibilitiesDeliver great results against defined activity, lead generation, conversion and customer experience outcomesGenerate new qualified leads thru outbound call programsExecute on marketing campaigns to increase new user acquisition and conversionsReceive and qualify inbound prospect and customer inquiriesResearch, create, develop targeted prospect listsEngage prospects and customers via online chat to drive conversions and qualify leadsCollect, analyze, report data around performance, campaign and operational executionShare, learn, collaborate with team members and manager to develop strategies, improve execution, and ideas that drive great team results and successProvide amazing prospect and customer experiencesWork hard, learn tons, gain experience and grow your careerRequirementsBachelor’s degree3-5 years related experience or internships in customer facing selling, technology, or consulting roles desirableExcellent interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skillsHighly professional demeanor and customer first mindsetDemonstrated capacity and strong willingness to learn and developMust welcome challenge and have problem solver mentalitySmart, energetic, enthusiastic, fearless, highly motivatedOur ValuesBe RealThink BigMove FastKeep Growing
